TopicTitle: Today I did my first extraplanetary landing in 1.whatever

Articles.Content:
Took me a bit because I'm using RemoteTech and another mod that puts kerbals into stasis and lets mechjeb take over so I had to set up a satellite network that always has links from Kerbin's space. 

Anyway

I am winrar, go me etc. etc album dump

[http://imgur.com/a/8R1v0](http://imgur.com/a/8R1v0)

Hoo rah!

Good job, and well done.

I totally restarted my career last night. Not a big loss because I was only 3 tiers up the Tech tree. lol.

But, Tonight will be my initial (stable) Orbit. With any luck I can rack up the science I need to unlock the bits for a Mun orbit and Landing in the next 2 or 3 launches.
Cheers! My next target is Moho, I need to figure out how to get there without roasting Jeb. As much as it would be humorous I need the science points

"roasting Jeb".

Now thats a thought... We dont have to deal with 'radiation' currently do we?.

Oh, unless.. No, Im sure there is radiation but Kerbals probably dont suffer from radiation sickness as we do.
I just finished landing on Mun in 1.0.X so \o/

My Duna Expedition is being launched in parts. Sent off return modules, landers, probe-controlled pre-deployable science packages, and a couple orbital modules. Now to send off mining and kolony modules... and finally crew modules.
I'm setting up for my Moho mission now, I have the station ready to refuel the ship, I have...well I don't have a ship but I have 54 days to design one

> 
> Cheers! My next target is Moho, As much as it would be humorous I need the science points

Why? There is enough science in Kerbin space for close to everything.

> 
> Why? There is enough science in Kerbin space for close to everything.

 This is true.. But you gotta get it. That can be trouble some.

Just ask my Bill K who almost did a re-entry sans Lander... lol.

> 
> Why? There is enough science in Kerbin space for close to everything.

while this is true I'm up to the part where you need 1000 science per thingy. I did a visit to Duna and got surface samples from 3 areas as well as ike and only unlocked 2 nodes
